shortDescription: Draw a sprite on the screen.
notes: This method draws the sprite from it's top-left corner.
This method uses the SpriteMap global as the default SpriteSheet, and would fail if it's invalid!

arguments.name: id
arguments.description: The ID of the sprite, as displayed in the Sprites Editor

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The X coord to draw the sprite at.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The Y coord to draw the sprite at.

arguments.name: r
arguments.description: The rotation of the sprite in radian.

arguments.name: sx
arguments.description: The scale factor of the sprite's width.

arguments.name: sy
arguments.description: The scale factor of the sprite's height.

arguments.name: sheet
arguments.description: The spritesheet to pick the sprite from.
